experience.title: Hall President(MT Hall of Residence) & Representative to Student Senate
experience.description: • Strategically managed a hall with 400+ boarders, led a team of 23 students with 7 portfolios• Managed distribution and the efficient allocation of the finances of the hall worth INR 12.4m• Increased participation by ~32% YoY, managing 37 teams in GC events; declared as the over-all winners in the inter hall Sports GC 2018-2019 first time ever, with 3 cups in different events• Established the first-ever alumni program for connecting the hall alumni of the last 3 years• Successfully executed election campaign of 4 Secretaries to Gymkhana; & nomination of IGSN• Improvised the PR by social media strategy for Facebook, Instagram and Youtube channel• Senate Member, Gymkhana: Took proactive measures for welfare of 10,600 students
experience.description_html: • Strategically managed a hall with 400+ boarders, led a team of 23 students with 7 portfolios• Managed distribution and the efficient allocation of the finances of the hall worth INR 12.4m• Increased participation by ~32% YoY, managing 37 teams in GC events; declared as the over-all winners in the inter hall Sports GC 2018-2019 first time ever, with 3 cups in different events• Established the first-ever alumni program for connecting the hall alumni of the last 3 years• Successfully executed election campaign of 4 Secretaries to Gymkhana; & nomination of IGSN• Improvised the PR by social media strategy for Facebook, Instagram and Youtube channel• Senate Member, Gymkhana: Took proactive measures for welfare of 10,600 students

experience.title: Risk and Quantitative Analyst
experience.description: Internship with Risk & Quants Team under the guidance of the Senior Vice PresidentProject1: Work process development to capture innovative data factors based on ESG• Comprehensively analyzed 250+ factors of ESG MSCI Manager for portfolio firms • Initiated work processes to capture 10 ESG & 4 AGR factors to improvise the idiosyncratic risk • Developed the KPI framework on the ESG criteria for potential investments of the fund house Project2: Developed NLP model to capture the controversies about firms & their top executives • Built large scale data mining system processing ~1m+ search results from the Google CSE API • Improvised forensics of INR 960m fund formulating an indicator company-wise for semantics

experience.title: Core Team Head
experience.description: The Street is the Finance Club of IIT Kharagpur.It is a platform for dissemination of finance related information among the student body of IIT Kharagpur. Primarily focused to develop interest and to guide people seeking a career in financeAs a part of it club conducts workshops and various events that spread financial knowledge.Club also solves real time problems faced by start-ups in finance and related fields.

experience.description: Department Representative, Career  Development  Centre	    •	Nominated representative (only 20 out of 1300 students); realised 1000+ placements in 8 days, the fastest ever, while working in a team of 33.•Initiated collaboration with Professors for tie ups in industry; developed relations with HR teams of over 50+ recruiters.

experience.title: Macroeconomic analyst
experience.description: Performed an analytical study in Macro Research Department of the firm on trade imbalances of India using last 40 years’ data.•	Calculated correlation between the independent variables and performed VIF Test to check for multicollinearity and performed Breusch-Godfrey Test to check for auto correlation and Breusch- Pagan Test for heteroscedasticity . •	Checked for co integration using ADF and CRDW Test and performed VECM using Granger Causality Test. •	ARIMA, GARCH to forecast the time series data and also built another regression model to do sector-wise analysis with exchange rates
experience.description_html: Performed an analytical study in Macro Research Department of the firm on trade imbalances of India using last 40 years’ data.• Calculated correlation between the independent variables and performed VIF Test to check for multicollinearity and performed Breusch-Godfrey Test to check for auto correlation and Breusch- Pagan Test for heteroscedasticity . • Checked for co integration using ADF and CRDW Test and performed VECM using Granger Causality Test. • ARIMA, GARCH to forecast the time series data and also built another regression model to do sector-wise analysis with exchange rates
